title: The C.I.A. Helped Pinpoint a Gathering of Iranian Leaders. Then Israel Struck.
summary_full: The killing of Iran’s supreme leader and other top Iranian officials came after close intelligence sharing between the United States and Israel, according to people familiar with the operation.
summary_public: The killing of Iran’s supreme leader and other top Iranian officials came after close intelligence sharing between the United States and Israel, according to people familiar with the operation.
